name: Santa Claus (itch)
description:
In this game, you fly your sleigh around, and look for presents to deliver to the houses around the mountains. If you hear chimes, then that means a present is near.

Controls:

W - speed up

S - slow down

Space - drop present

Escape - Exit at anytime

Look around with mouse

If a house has smoke coming out of its chimney, then you have already delivered a present there.
